localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: An interactive space that shows how product management best practices work, including working examples of OKRs, outcome-based roadmaps, along with real examples of ideas, experiments, and customer feedback. Add, delete, and move items around as if you were using the tool to manage your own products.
blogPost.body: An interactive space that shows how product management best practices work, including working examples of OKRs, outcome-based roadmaps, along with real examples of ideas, experiments, and customer feedback. Add, delete, and move items around as if you were using the tool to manage your own products.
blogPost.title: ProdPad Sandbox - Explore product mgmt best practices in an interactive space!
blogPost.author: Janna Bastow

localize.description: 一个展示产品管理最佳实践如何运作的互动空间，包括OKR的工作实例、基于结果的路线图，以及想法、实验和客户反馈的真实案例。添加、删除和移动项目，就像你在使用该工具管理自己的产品一样。
localize.tagline: 在互动空间中探索产品管理的最佳实践!

localize.description: 一個展示產品管理最佳實踐如何運作的互動空間，包括OKR的工作實例、基於結果的路線圖，以及想法、實驗和客戶反饋的真實案例。添加、刪除和移動項目，就像你在使用該工具管理自己的產品一樣。
localize.tagline: 在互動空間中探索產品管理的最佳實踐!

previous.excerpt: Webiny is an open-source framework that helps developers architect, build and deploy applications on top of the serverless infrastructure. Webiny also comes with a serverless CMS that runs on top of AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and S3.
previous.title: Webiny 5.0 - Build serverless applications and websites in minutes

localize.description: Webiny是一个开源框架，可以帮助开发者在无服务器基础设施之上架构、构建和部署应用。Webiny还附带了一个无服务器CMS，运行在AWS Lambda、DynamoDB和S3之上。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内构建无服务器应用程序和网站

localize.description: Webiny是一個開源框架，可以幫助開發者在無服務器基礎設施之上架構、構建和部署應用。Webiny還附帶了一個無服務器CMS，運行在AWS Lambda、DynamoDB和S3之上。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內構建無服務器應用程序和網站

next.excerpt: Perfect Recall is a free app that lets you make highlight reels from your Zoom calls simply by selecting the transcript text. Share these reels instead of written notes as engaging summaries to show ‘what happened’.
next.title: Perfect Recall 2.0 - Transcribe and share clips from your Zoom calls for free

localize.description: Perfect Recall 是一款免费的应用程序，它可以让您从您的 Zoom 通话中简单地选择记录文本来制作高亮卷轴。分享这些卷轴，而不是书面笔记，作为吸引人的总结，以显示 "发生了什么"。
localize.tagline: 免费转录和分享Zoom通话的片段。

localize.description: Perfect Recall 是一款免費的應用程序，它可以讓您從您的 Zoom 通話中簡單地選擇記錄文本來製作高亮卷軸。分享這些卷軸，而不是書面筆記，作爲吸引人的總結，以顯示 "發生了什麼"。
localize.tagline: 免費轉錄和分享Zoom通話的片段。
